input_brief: Refine mockups from MM-003: adjust colors, masks, and shadows; prepare variants for 4-color options. Provide quality checklist and iteration notes per theme.

color_adjustments: Gold (#C9A84C) must print warm — test on dark fabric; DTG gold tends to go olive. Bump saturation +10% for fabric prints.
Dark red accent (#8B0000) reads well on screen but may darken further on black fabric. Lighten to #A51010 for apparel.
Poster version: keep original palette. No adjustment needed for paper.

quality_checklist.color_mode: CMYK for print, sRGB for POD platform upload
quality_checklist.transparency: V2 vector: ensure true transparent background (PNG-24), no white matte
quality_checklist.line_weight: V2 gold linework: minimum 2px at print resolution to avoid dropout

iteration_prompts: If V1 eye looks too photorealistic and clashes with the vector capitol: re-prompt with 'consistent digital illustration style throughout, no photorealism mixing'
If gold tones are too yellow: add 'antique brass, warm metallic, aged gold' to prompt

color_adjustments: Neon green (#00FFA3) is OUT OF GAMUT for CMYK. For print: shift to #00CC7F and accept the compromise OR keep for DTG/sublimation only.
For mug sublimation: neon will pop — keep RGB values.
Desk mat: sublimation prints well in full RGB gamut. Keep original palette.
T-shirt DTG: desaturate neon by 15% to avoid that 'glowing' look that DTG can't reproduce.

quality_checklist.resolution_min: 300dpi, panoramic versions need 10500x4650px minimum for desk mats
quality_checklist.bleed: Mug wrap: extend art 0.125" past trim on all edges
quality_checklist.color_mode: sRGB for POD uploads, CMYK proof for premium prints
quality_checklist.transparency: Not needed — all on dark/colored backgrounds
quality_checklist.detail_test: Print a 3-inch crop of the cipher symbols — if unreadable, simplify

iteration_prompts: If cipher symbols look random/meaningless: re-prompt with 'recognizable cryptographic and alchemical symbols: Ouroboros, Eye of Horus, binary sequences, hexadecimal strings'
If cityscape looks generic: add 'distinctive brutalist and art deco architecture mix, unique skyline silhouette'

color_adjustments: Black bars: use true black (#000000) for screen, rich black (C60 M40 Y40 K100) for offset print.
Red stamp (#CC0000): prints reliably across all methods. No adjustment needed.
Inverted version (white on black): white ink DTG quality varies — test on sample before bulk.
Paper texture in V1: keep subtle. Over-textured backgrounds increase file size and print complexity.

quality_checklist.resolution_min: 300dpi, but this theme is mostly vector/text so 600dpi is achievable
quality_checklist.color_mode: Technically 2-3 spot colors possible for screenprint — cost advantage
quality_checklist.transparency: White tee version: transparent background NOT needed (white base). Black tee version: transparent PNG with white ink layer
quality_checklist.text_legibility: Visible words between bars must be readable at arm's length on a tee (min 24pt equivalent)

iteration_prompts: If visible words look too clean/digital: add 'typewriter imperfections, uneven ink density, slight character misalignment'
If CLASSIFIED stamp looks clip-art-ish: 're-prompt with rubber stamp texture, partial ink transfer, edge bleed, rotated 12-18 degrees'

color_adjustments: Gold irises (#FFD700): ensure they remain the focal point. If clouds overpower, increase iris brightness +15%.
Steel blue (#4A6FA5) on navy t-shirt: low contrast risk. Lighten to #6B8FC5 for apparel or add white outline.
Canvas print: keep full dynamic range. Warm whites in clouds should print beautifully on premium canvas.

quality_checklist.resolution_min: 300dpi. V1 surreal painting needs high-res source — AI upscale to 4800x4800px minimum for 16x16 canvas
quality_checklist.bleed: Canvas gallery wrap: extend art 1.5" on all sides for wrapping
quality_checklist.color_mode: sRGB for canvas/POD. Test print a proof — subtle eye details are make-or-break
quality_checklist.detail_test: Eyes must be visible but not immediately obvious from 6 feet. Check at multiple viewing distances.

iteration_prompts: If eyes are TOO obvious (creepy not artistic): 'make eyes more subtle, partially obscured by cloud wisps, visible only upon close inspection, pareidolia effect'
If eyes are TOO hidden (invisible): 'golden irises should catch light, subtle but discoverable, slight luminous glow around each eye'

color_adjustments: Cyan (#00E5FF) is out of CMYK gamut. For standard print: shift to #00B8D4. For DTG/sublimation: keep original.
Purple (#7B2FBE) prints well in most methods. No adjustment.
Holographic sticker: design should be single-color outlines ONLY (the holo material provides the color shift).
Tapestry sublimation: full RGB gamut supported. Keep vivid.

quality_checklist.resolution_min: Vector preferred for V2. V1 detailed: 6000x6000px minimum for tapestry
quality_checklist.bleed: Tapestry: 1" bleed, design must tile or extend to edges cleanly
quality_checklist.color_mode: sRGB for POD, vector (SVG/AI) deliverable for screenprint
quality_checklist.transparency: T-shirt version: transparent PNG. Sticker: transparent with die-cut path
quality_checklist.symmetry_check: CRITICAL — overlay grid and verify perfect radial symmetry. Any asymmetry kills the design.

iteration_prompts: If sacred geometry looks hand-drawn/wobbly: 'mathematically precise sacred geometry, perfect symmetry, computer-generated precision, ruler-straight lines'
If tech symbols look forced: 'organically integrate WiFi, power, and data symbols INTO the geometry nodes, not overlaid on top'

color_adjustments: Electric blue (#3A86FF) is vibrant and within gamut for most print methods. No adjustment for standard POD.
Deep navy (#0B132B) vs pure black: on black garments, the navy tones will be invisible. Lighten background to #1A2540 for apparel versions.
Poster/canvas: keep original dark values. Paper/canvas whites handle the contrast well.
Earth glow: warm highlight (#FFE0A0) on the globe provides the only warm tone. Don't lose it.

quality_checklist.transparency: Hoodie back print: transparent PNG. Small chest logo: transparent with padding.
quality_checklist.scale_test: The eye-to-Earth scale ratio must feel dramatic. If Earth is too large, the power dynamic is lost.

iteration_prompts: If the cosmic eye looks like a nebula photo (too literal): 'stylized ethereal eye, painterly brushstrokes, not photographic, art concept illustration'
If Earth looks like a stock globe: 'softly glowing planet Earth viewed from cosmic distance, atmospheric haze, city lights visible on night side, not a sharp satellite photo'

master_production_notes.color_profiles: Embed sRGB IEC61966-2.1 in all files. CMYK conversions only for offset/screenprint orders.
master_production_notes.upscaling: Use Real-ESRGAN or Topaz Gigapixel for AI-generated images that need 300dpi at large sizes.
master_production_notes.proofing: Order one sample of each hero product before listing. Check: color accuracy, detail preservation, placement alignment.
master_production_notes.formats: PNG-24 for raster, SVG for vector, PDF/X-4 for print-ready packages
